// https://www.codechef.com/problems/IOPC14O
// Accepted
 
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
 
using namespace std;
 
typedef long long ll;
typedef pair<int, int> pi;
 
#define MP make_pair
#define PB push_back
#define F first
#define S second
#define MOD 1000000007
 
ll gcd(ll a, ll b)
{
	while(b)
		b ^= a ^= b ^= a %= b;
	return a;
}
 
int main()
{
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t;
	ll p, q;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin >> p >> q;
		if(p == q)
			cout << "YES" << endl;
		else
		{
			if(p > 2 * q)
			{
				cout << "NO" << endl;
				continue;
			}
			ll _gcd = gcd(p, q);
			q /= _gcd;
			p /= _gcd;
			if(!(p & (p - 1)))
			{
				while(q % 2 == 0)
				{
					q /= 2;
				}
				q++;
				if( !(q & (q - 1)))
					cout << "YES" << endl;
				else
					cout << "NO" << endl;
			}
			else
				cout << "NO" << endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
